description: This is an Express.js route module that manages API endpoints related to 'environments' within a workspace/project context. It defines routes for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting environments, and includes Swagger documentation annotations for API specifications.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all environments for a given project.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new environment within a project.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve data for a specific environment.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update details of a specific environment.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a specific environment.
